about_the_game:
Project: Aurora is an exploration game combining base building, survival with resource management, and a unique sci-fi storyline. This is the demo of the game.

You are the captain of the research mission, which lands on the surface of the newly discovered planet. Your task is to conduct the mission, manage its facilities, and organize an expedition deep into the unexplored areas of Aurora. You must learn about the past of the planet and look for traces of the lost expedition, whose last trace was an incomprehensible alarm signal.

SURVIVAL

You will run a research program on an alien planet. You need to take care of supplies and development of facilities, but also the lives of your crewmembers. Remember that studying alien planets is a dangerous job. Each crew member can get sick, injured or even die.

REAL SANDBOX

Explore Vast Unknown Planet. You decide where you go, what you will do, how much risk you will take. The whole area of research is open to you. Your next expeditions (and discoveries) depend on your decisions, planning skills and what you want to know.

HARD SCI-FI

Each element appearing in the game has been supported by modern scientific knowledge. All the discoveries that you will make in the game are logically related to real biology, geology, archeology, physics etc. Research methods and tools available to you are based on real methods of conducting research and archeological works.

BUILDING AND RESOURCE MANAGEMENT

One of your tasks is to expand the base, You decide what to spend the acquired funds and how to further develop the base and the research mission. Acquiring energy, researching new technologies, using minerals found on the planet, also building mines, refineries, power plants and laboratories becomes essential.

STORYLINE AND MISTERY

Together with your crew, you will embark on a research expedition to a newly discovered planet. However, this planet has many unfathomable secrets. Use the knowledge of scientific specialists and experience the history like in the best times of science fiction literature.

Your mission is to learn the history of the planet and its inhabitants and unravel the mystery of the missing research team. However, things can get complicated, and obvious things are not so clear. Discover the rich history of past cultures and the story of people who came across the unknown. Be ready to make difficult decisions and then accept their consequences.

content_descriptors.notes: Project: Aurora is a story about a horrifying encounter with something utterly alien. The game features disturbing scenes and descriptions, elements of body horror and mental distress, including descending into madness. Characters in the game are exposed to the risk of death, which involves descriptions of accidents and illnesses. There are also references to the use of tobacco, alcohol, and drugs.

short_description: Project: Aurora is a survival adventure with a focus on exploration, exquisite storytelling with base building on planet and resource management. You are a captain of the research mission. Build a base, discover technologies, explore, learn the secret of Aurora to survive in a hostile environment.
